Detailed Description

The Phone Debug Interface.

Function Documentation

int rtk_GpioControl ( unsigned long  action,
unsigned long  pid,
unsigned long  value,
unsigned long *  ret_value 
)

GPIO control.

Parameters
actionAction
0: GPIO init
1: Read
2: Write
pidpid = (gpio_group << 16) | (gpio_pin & 0xFFFF)
valueValue
For GPIO Read/Write:
Bit 0: Disable = 0, Enable = 1
For GPIO init:
Bit 0-1: GPIO_PERIPHERAL
Bit 2: GPIO_DIRECTION
Bit 3: GPIO_INTERRUPT_TYPE
ret_valueRead result
Return values
0Success
int rtk_SetSlicRelay ( uint32  chid,
uint32  close 
)

Set SLIC relay mode.

Parameters
chidChannel number
closeA boolean value to indicate circuit between SLIC and phone.
0: Open
1: Close
Return values
0Success
Note
Because kernel will switch relay to correct state, application doesn't need to control relay normally.

uint32 rtk_GetSlicRegVal ( uint32  chid,
uint32  reg,
uint8 *  regdata 
)

Get SLIC(DAA) register value. (Supported for Silicon Lab and Zarlink)

Parameters
chidThe SLIC(DAA) channel number.

Return values

int  reg,
int  len,

Set SLIC(DAA) register value. (Supported for Silicon Lab and Zarlink)

Parameters
chidThe SLIC(DAA) channel number.
regSLIC(DAA) register number.
lenThe length of SLIC(DAA) register (unit: byte).
regdataThe value of the SLIC(DAA) register.
Return values
0Success
int rtk_SetPcmLoopMode ( char  group,
char  mode,
char  main_ch,
char  mate_ch 
)

Set PCM Loop Mode.

Parameters
groupGroup.
Channel is in gruop "group", if group <0, means not in pcm loop mode
modeMode
0: Not loop mode
1: Loop mode
2: Loop mode with VoIP
main_chMain channel
If the mode is 2, main channel will create VoIP session.
mate_chMate channel
If the mode is 2, mate channel will NOT create VoIP session.
Return values
0Success
int rtk_Print ( int  level,
char *  module,
char *  msg 
)

Print message via kernel.

Parameters
levelDebug level

Debug level level
Error 0
Warning 1
Info 2
Trace 3
moduleModule name
msgDebug message
Return values
0Success
